results.definition: the coloring of a person's face
a combination that results from coupling or interlinking
a point of view or general attitude or inclination
examples: he altered the complexion of his times
The setting sun complexioned the hills

results.definition: (obsolete) a combination of elements (of dryness and warmth or of the four humors) that was once believed to determine a person's health and temperament
texture and appearance of the skin of the face
